286 
 
COURSE/DEGREE AWARDING 
INSTITUTIONS  
REQUIREMENTS    
UTME SUBJECTS  
SPECIAL CONSIDERATION (WAIVER) REMARKS  
DIRECT ENTRY  UTME  
     (vii)  MAKURDI requires Biology, Physics and Chemistry.  
  
EDUCATION AND MUSIC:  
 AGBORCOE      
 DELSU            
 EDALV            
 IAUED      
 NSUGBE        
 OAU         
UNN  
UYO  
Two (2) ‘A’ level 
passes/NCE merit in 
Music.  
  
Five (5) SSC credit 
passes including 
Music and English 
Language.  
  
Music and any other two (2) 
Arts/Social Science subjects.  
  
DIRECT ENTRY  
 (i)  DELSU and EDALV accept ND in Music.   
(iii) OAU accepts ‘A’ level passes in Music and one (1) other 
subject. Credit or merit in NCE Music double major or 
NCE Music combined with any other teaching or 
professional subject. Holders of NCE certificate in 
Music are eligible for admission with or w ithout ‘O’ 
level Music.  
(iii) IAUED accepts two (2)'A’ level passes including Literature 
in English and one (1) other Arts subject.  
  
  UTME  
(i) DELSU accepts credit in Music at ‘O’ level.  
(ii) IAUEDMusic is not compulsory.  
(iii) OAU requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit passesincluding 
English Language ANDMusic.  Credit/merit in TCII or 
Certificate in Associated Board of the Royal School of 
Music (ARRASM) are acceptable.  
(iv) UYO does not insist on 'O' level credit pass in Music 
but requires 'O' level credit pass in Mathematics.  
  
UTME SUBJECTS  
 (i)  IAUEDMusic is not compulsory.
